2023 Football Roster

84 Jeremiah Gradowitz

Position Wide Receiver

Ht./Wt. 5-9 / 167

Class Redshirt Junior

Hometown Bakersfield, Calif.

High School Stockdale HS

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

NEVADA CAREER

RS JUNIOR (2023): Played in one game, seeing action at No. 6/6 USC (Sept. 2).

RS SOPHOMORE (2022): Appeared in three games ... Did not record a stat ... Made collegiate debut against Texas State (Sept. 3).

SOPHOMORE (2021): Redshirt season ... Did not make an appearance.

FRESHMAN (2020): Did not make an appearance.

HIGH SCHOOL CAREER

Graduated from Stockdale High School in Bakersfield, Calif. where he was a two-sport athlete in football and track & field … Earned first team all-league and all-area honors in 2019, along with being named the team MVP … Racked up over 1,000 receiving yards and 13 touchdowns in his career … Was on the honor roll all four years of high school.

PERSONAL

Son of Melanie Monsibais Gradowitz and Kraig Gradowitz … Has three siblings, Jacqui, Kraig and Samantha … Undecided on a major … Chose Nevada because it’s the best place for his education and to reach his highest potential as a player … Also recruited by UC Davis, Eastern Washington and Bucknell … Lists Julian Edelman and Davante Adams as his sports heroes … The most memorable moment of his pre-Nevada career was the Righetti playoff game his senior year … Enjoys working out an hanging out with family and friends in his free time.
